p: Platycladus orientalis is used in Iranian traditional medicine as an astringent, stomach tonic, diuretic, tonic and antipyretic effect ( 16). The essential oil of P. orientalis has been evaluated for antimicrobial activity ( 17), antifungal activity ( 18, 19), cytotoxicologic activity ( 20), molluscicidal activity ( 21) and insecticide activity ( 22, 23).
